Project

Class CabDB

  • java.lang.Object
    • Project.CabDB

  • public class CabDB
extends java.lang.Object
    Serves as a database management class for cab booking system. Maintains four databases - 1. CabFleet.db - Inventory of all cabs. Stores 'Cab' objects. 2. CabDestinationBased.db - Stores destination based bookings (CabBookDestinationBased objects) 3. CabDistanceBased.db - Stores distance based bookings (CabBookDistanceBased objects) 4. CabBookTimeBased.db - Stores time based bookings (CabBookTimeBased objects)
    Author:
    nisarg
